user_query: My company is expanding its operations to Portugal and we need a tool that can help us find addresses/streets by specifying the postcode.

TaskList.description: Research available tools or APIs that can retrieve addresses and streets based on a specified postcode in Portugal.
Evaluate the found tools based on features, such as the ability to provide district, council, and locality information.
Compile a list of recommended tools/APIs along with their attributes and usage instructions.
